name: Kinzoku No Catana
description:
This game is a Single-player ARPG. It does "not" include multi-player.
You go around exploring collecting things and doing quests only to realize you need to get better with saving every item for every encounter to not die and lose unsaved progress. It could be changed later on.

If you decide to buy this, you will get:

- To play the included characters. (Reiji/Nijota)
- A large world to explore.
- Lumina to collect (Little Grass Orb/HP Item)
- 1 Samurai's Grass Quest
- Motion Active Grass
- Cool Title Screen (Playable literally...)
- Animated Enemies to fight (Level 1 - 3 / The 4th one is in progress.)
- WIP Merchants (No items from them yet or valuables.)
- A bit more that was added around the end of January.

If you are active and get updates you may get:

- More items
- More quests
- Possible Improved Gameplay/Combat
- Stats
- More or Improved Action VFX/SFX/Music
- More to see.
